entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
